backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - Real API calls
original_prompt: Clear my Thursday afternoon. Update my RSVPs and help me reschedule my meetings to another time and show me as {status}.

gutts.name: Identify Thursday Afternoon Time Range
gutts.capability: Determine the exact time slots that constitute Thursday afternoon in the user's calendar context.
gutts.user_goal: Understand which time blocks need to be cleared.
gutts.evidence: Parsing 'Thursday afternoon' into a specific time range, e.g., 12:00 PM - 5:00 PM on Thursday.

gutts.name: Retrieve Events in Specified Time Range
gutts.capability: Fetch all calendar events scheduled during the identified Thursday afternoon time range.
gutts.user_goal: Get a list of all events that need to be cleared.
gutts.evidence: Querying the calendar API for events between 12:00 PM and 5:00 PM on Thursday.

gutts.name: Cancel or Remove Events from Time Range
gutts.capability: Cancel or remove all identified events from the user's calendar for Thursday afternoon.
gutts.evidence: Sending cancellation requests for each event in the identified time range.

gutts.name: Update RSVPs for Affected Events
gutts.capability: Update the user's RSVP status for all events that were canceled or rescheduled.
gutts.user_goal: Ensure event organizers know the user is no longer attending.
gutts.evidence: Setting RSVP status to 'Declined' for canceled events via API.

gutts.name: Identify Alternative Time Slots for Rescheduling
gutts.capability: Find suitable alternative time slots for meetings that were removed from Thursday afternoon.
gutts.user_goal: Determine when to reschedule the displaced meetings.
gutts.evidence: Scanning user's calendar for open slots that meet meeting duration and participant availability.

gutts.name: Propose New Times to Meeting Participants
gutts.capability: Send rescheduling proposals to all participants for the affected meetings.
gutts.user_goal: Communicate new proposed times to participants.
gutts.evidence: Sending updated meeting invites with proposed alternative time slots.

gutts.name: Update Calendar with Rescheduled Meetings
gutts.capability: Confirm and update the calendar with new meeting times once participants accept.
gutts.user_goal: Ensure the calendar reflects the new meeting schedule.
gutts.evidence: Replacing old meeting entries with new confirmed times in the calendar.

gutts.name: Set User Status for Thursday Afternoon
gutts.capability: Update the user's calendar status (e.g., Free, Busy, Out of Office) for the cleared Thursday afternoon period.
gutts.user_goal: Reflect the desired availability status for Thursday afternoon.
gutts.evidence: Marking the cleared time range as 'Free' or 'Out of Office' based on {status}.
